Good game. Cheater situation seems to have stabilized !

A fast paced and tactical shooter where your ability to aim is important but your ability to perceive your opponents next move and act accordingly is even more important. Like any game that demands a high level of performance to return a successful outcome it is equal parts frustrating and rewarding. 

Best enjoyed with friends.

If you wanna rupture multiple veins in your head at once, I highly recommend this game... If you wanna live a happy life, avoid this game at all costs.

Dont play with randoms - but if you do this will be helpful:

Initiate with
My russian is bad = Ya plokha gavaryoo pa rooskee
Do you speak English? = Vi gavareetye pa angleeskee?

Basics
Hello = Privyet
Yes = da
No = Niet
Thanks = Spasiba
Sorry = Izvini
Good job = Maladyets
Nice! (For example a nice play) = Harosho!
Please/You're welcome = Pozhalusta
Good game = Haroshaya igra
Thanks for the game = Spaciba za igra

Calls basics
Eco = Eca
Drop me [weapon] = dropni mnje [weapon]
Buy me [Weapon] = Kupi mnje [Weapon]
Rush = Rashim

Weapons
AWP = A-ve-pe
AK47 = Kalash(nikov)
M4 = Emku
P90 = Petuh
Scout = Muha

Dust 2
Long = Dlina
Pit = Yama
Short = Ziga
Mid = Mido
Tunnel = Tyomka
Door = Dveri
Car = Mashina

Mirage
Short = Ziga
Mid = Mido
Pit/T-stairs = Yama
Apartments = Apartamenty/Aparty
Palace = Cowry
Chair = Stool
Ladder = Lest-nee-ca
Stairs = Stoo-pee-ne

Colours
Green = Zeloyni
Purple = Fioletoviy
Orange = Oranzhevi
Red = Krasny
Blue = Zini
Yellow = Sholty

Numbers
One = Adeen
Two = Dva
Three = Tree (Hard R)
Four = Chetyre
Five = Pyat
